name: Roll n' Roll
description:
Roll n' Roll is my project for the GMTK Game Jam 2022,  and my first ever real game :)

Heavily inspired by Enter the Gungeon and Holocure this game makes you survive in a pseudo-bullet hell with hordes of enemy with different attack patterns.

The game is simple, [SPACE BAR] to dodgeroll and [LEFT CLICK] to shoot, you shoot die that keep rolling until they hit an enemy to deal damage equal to the dice number.

I still want to add upgrades to the dice, to make it more replayable, but had little time.

Thanks a lot for all these lovely people:

  • analogStudios_ for the amazing sprites
  • kenney for all the map assets and sound effects
  • Of Far Different Naturefor the BMG "Nature"

And for everyone who supported me during these two days.

By the way, sorry but the chests are fake
